nodes.text: In 0 ABY Doctor Chelli Aphra assaulted the Naboo villa of the retired mortician Commodex Tahn on behalf of the Sith Lord Darth Vader. She stormed the villa with a force of battle droids, and although Tahn tried to fight back with a DC-15A blaster rifle, he was injured and captured. 0-0-0 began torturing him to learn information about Padmé Amidala. After learning that she had indeed given birth to a son, 0-0-0 electrocuted Tahn to death.
